summary:
So Frostapalooza happened on Saturday. 

It was joyous. 

It all started back in July of last year when I got an email from Brad:


  Next summer I’m turning 40, and I’m going to use that milestone as an excuse to play a big concert with and for all of my friends and family...
title: Frostapalooza
